The video was published on YouTube on Ap: 2020, and has been viewed more than 20,000 times.
The video shows military vehicles travel: a city located in the Chinese province of Liaoning, at the border with North Korea.
The video includes simplified Chinese: language text superimposed on the footage, which translates to English as "Truth is life" and "Military vehicles on Dandong streets / Crisis at the China-North Korea border."
The claim was circulated online in late: following speculation about Kim Jong Un's health, and was debunked by data journalist Min Chao Choy on Twitter.
